course_description: Laws of thermodynamics, entropy, Carnot engine, thermodynamic potentials, Gibbs ensembles, classical and quantum statistics, photon gas, phonons, Debye theory, electron gas, Bose-Einstein condensation, chemical kinetics, phase transitions, and critical phenomena.
prerequisites: PHYS 220 and (PHYS 253 or PHYS_OX 253) or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
schedule_location: MW 11:30am-12:45pm in Math & Science Center - E300
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 1981, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 11:30a-12:45p, Instructor: W. Benalcazar, Status: Closed
